title: Human Sacrifice in Avengers Infinity War
description:
In the Movie Avengers Infinity War we see the breakdown of the modern worship of the individual and the resurgence of a narrative portraying the inevitability of human sacrifice.  

The video was edited by Thomas Wijnaendts Van Resandt from the Storytellers channel:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbphDfwSJmxk1Ny_3Oicrng

Event in Seattle:  https://www.shared-inheritance.com/
Event in Louisiana: https://thesymbolicworld.com/event/shreveport-louisiana/
Carving Workshops: https://www.hexaemeron.org/carving 

Support this channel: https://thesymbolicworld.com/support/

patreon: http://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
subscribestar: https://www.subscribestar.com/jonatha...
paypal: http://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com
facebook: http://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicWorld
twitter: http://www.twitter.com/pageaujonathan

My website designers,  Anomalist Design: https://www.anomalistdesign.com/

Outro music was written and recorded by Matthew Wilkinson.  

The music at the opening is Russian Eastern Overture, by Rimsky Korsakov.
